basics.name: Luis Medina
basics.label: Frontend Engineer
basics.summary: Developer appasionate to learning  new technologies

highlights: Improved client development workflow by incorpating modern tools like: React, Style Components, Redux Authentication, React Native, Express.

As a Front End Developer, I developed with my team a hybrid app with react native for both platforms IOS and Android, I developed some parts of UI with functionality and some authentication with tokens, I implemented some services in the front-end, for the tasks and features I used jira and bit bucket for manage agile and software development

education.institution: Centro Universitario De Monterrey(University of Guadalajara)
